sentences.english: DGCA category I rating earned in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 民航總局第一類在2007年獲得評級。

sentences.english: NOC is Yuan Weimin, Ministry of the state General Administration for Sports.
sentences.chinese: 現任中國奧委會主席是國家體育總局局長袁偉民。

sentences.english: The CAAC said it won't approve applications for new airlines.
sentences.chinese: 民航總局稱，將不再批准新設航空公司的申請。

sentences.english: The current President of the NOC is Yuan Weimin, Ministry of the state General Administration for Sports.
sentences.chinese: 現任中國奧委會主席是國家體育總局局長袁偉民。

sentences.english: An official letter issued by MOTC or DGT to reject the application made by the applicant.
sentences.chinese: 交通部或電信總局駁回申請人之申請案之公文。

sentences.english: The criteria of telecommunication numbers usage fees shall be enacted by the DGT.
sentences.chinese: 電信號碼使用費之收費基準，由電信總局訂定之。

sentences.english: In case of any problems encountered during enforcement, please feedback in timely to the Management Department of Current Accounts under the SAFE.
sentences.chinese: 執行中如遇問題請及時向總局經常項目管理司反饋。

sentences.english: The SAT people have discussed it as a problem.
sentences.chinese: 國家稅務總局人們所討論的這有什麼問題。

sentences.english: Pan Yue is deputy director of China's State Environmental Protection Administration (SEPA).
sentences.chinese: 潘岳，中國國家環保總局副局長。

sentences.english: The agency didn't respond to requests for comment.
sentences.chinese: 工商總局沒有迴應置評請求。

sentences.english: But buildings announced by the DGT are not subject to this restriction.
sentences.chinese: 但經電信總局公告之建築物，不在此限。

sentences.english: I take important papers to the post office and hand them to the agent.
sentences.chinese: 我採取的重要文件，向郵政總局並把他們的代理人。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhao said he never considered registering the film with the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television, also known as Sarft, the main regulator and censor of films.
sentences.chinese: 他說根本沒考慮過拿電影去廣電總局送審。

sentences.english: China's State Administration for Industry and Commerce has named and shamed 18 substandard Chinese food brands.
sentences.chinese: 國家工商總局公開通報了18種質量不合格食品品牌。

sentences.english: It is not the first time that SARFT has made an eccentric ruling.
sentences.chinese: 這並非廣電總局第一次作此怪異的規定。

sentences.english: Cartoons co-produced by domestic and foreign producers will have to get approval first.
sentences.chinese: 中外合拍動畫片在這一時段播出，需報廣電總局批准。

definition: (political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
to reply officially to a subordinate
abbr. for 國家發展和改革委員會|国家发展和改革委员会, PRC National Development and Reform Commission (NDRC), formed in 2003
to halt/to stay/to be stationed (of troops, diplomats etc)
